articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: India needs to internationalise payment products: RBI Governor - India Today
articles.description: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das on Saturday said India's home-grown payment products like UPI and RuPay network are increasing their global footprint and will make cross-border payments easier.
articles.content: By Press Trust of India: Reserve Bank Governor Shaktikanta Das on Saturday underlined the need for using the G20 presidency to present India's e-payment story to the global audience and seize the opp… [+3072 chars]
